@User_intent: Reset all network settings on the phone.
@Page_components:
Reset Wi-Fi, mobile & Bluetooth

This will reset all network settings, including: Wi‑Fi Mobile data Bluetooth

@Module.Name: Predict
@Module.Description: This module is a prediction model, predicting what will appear after clicking each components on current screen

@Module.Name: Evaluate
@Module.Description: This module is an evaluation module, evaluating the selected components of their contribution to fulfilling the user's intent

@Module.Name: Decide
@Module.Description: This module is a decision module, deciding the final action based on the evaluation result, whether complete or wrong or go on

Output.reason: The user is prompted to confirm the reset of all network settings, which is the final step to complete the task. The 'Reset settings' button needs to be clicked to proceed.

@History_operation: -> Click on clickable 'android:id/title' Network & internet 'android:id/summary' Wi‑Fi, mobile, data usage, and hotspot -> Scroll forward on android.widget.ScrollView -> Scroll forward on android.widget.ScrollView -> Click on clickable 'android:id/title' System 'android:id/summary' Languages, gestures, time, backup -> Click on clickable 'android:id/title' Advanced 'android:id/summary' Reset options, Multiple users, Developer options, System update -> Click on clickable 'android:id/title' Reset options 'android:id/summary' Network, apps, or device can be reset -> Click on clickable 'android:id/title' Reset Wi-Fi, mobile & Bluetooth -> Click on 'com.android.settings:id/initiate_reset_network' Reset settings
@Successive_Page:
Reset?

Reset all network settings? You can’t undo this action.
